arts.ttl: Lyon predicted XI v Strasbourg: Malick Fofana and Tyler Morton in, Ruben Kluivert out
arts.sum: Lyon host Strasbourg on Sunday to conclude Ligue 1’s Matchday 9. Both teams were involved in European mid-week football recently. Les Gones maintained their perfect record in the Europa League…
